item.title: Episode 3 - Tue Oct 28 2025
item.description: Top Transportation and Logistics Stories for Tue Oct 28 2025 Here are the links for the stories: That's your rapid-fire industry update for today.For more details, you can find the original articles at:https://www.freightwaves.com/news/freight-volumes-surge-spot-rates-rise-after-memorial-dayhttps://www.freightwaves.com/news/rail-intermodal-volumes-climb-after-memorial-dayhttps://www.supplychaindive.com/news/supply-chain-visibility-platforms-technology-logistics-challenges/717466/https://www.freightwaves.com/news/amazon-air-scales-back-growth-planshttps://www.supplychaindive.com/news/ai-analytics-logistics-improve-cut-costs/717464/
